snippet: It took 11 years to build the team of 18 people who give the watch all of its hand-finishing.
abstract: Exclusive watchmaker Greubel Forsey introduces Quadruple Tourbillon wristwatch for $815,000; company co-founder Stephen Forsey shares details of its hand-finished engineering and technical components that explain its extremely high cost.
lead_paragraph: It took 11 years to build the team of 18 people who give the watch all of its hand-finishing.
